name: obsidian-granola-importer
description: Import your Granola notes into Obsidian with perfect formatting preservation

scripts.analyze: node esbuild.config.mjs production --metafile=meta.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const meta=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('meta.json')); console.log('Bundle size:', fs.statSync('main.js').size, 'bytes'); console.log('Dependencies:', Object.keys(meta.inputs).length, 'files'); console.log('Tree shaking savings:', Object.values(meta.outputs).reduce((acc,o)=>acc+o.bytes,0)-fs.statSync('main.js').size, 'bytes');"
scripts.perf: npm run analyze && npm audit --audit-level moderate
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: amittell
